self.title: CDISC SDTM Hepatic Findings About Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test names that describe hepatic findings.
name: Hepatic Findings About Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Hepatic Findings About Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: A grading system to describe the severity of hepatic encephalopathy based on the level of mental status, per the West Haven Criteria. (NCI)
